channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Integrated Data Protection Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Integrated Data Protection Appliance

item.title: CVE-2019-3747|2024-08-04T19:19:17.626Z -- dell -- integrated%20data%20protection%20appliance
item.description: Dell EMC Integrated Data Protection Appliance versions prior to 2.3 contain a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability. A remote malicious ACM admin user may potentially exploit this vulnerability to store malicious HTML or JavaScript code in Cloud DR add-on specific field. When victim users access the page through their browsers, the malicious code gets executed by the web browser in the context of the vulnerable web application.

item.title: CVE-2020-5350|2024-08-04T08:30:23.318Z -- dell -- integrated%20data%20protection%20appliance
item.description: Dell EMC Integrated Data Protection Appliance versions 2.0, 2.1, 2.2, 2.3, 2.4 contain a command injection vulnerability in the ACM component. A remote authenticated malicious user with root privileges could inject parameters in the ACM component APIs that could lead to manipulation of passwords and execution of malicious commands on ACM component.

item.title: CVE-2019-3736|2024-08-04T19:19:18.261Z -- dell -- integrated%20data%20protection%20appliance
item.description: Dell EMC Integrated Data Protection Appliance versions prior to 2.3 contain a password storage vulnerability in the ACM component. A remote authenticated malicious user with root privileges may potentially use a support tool to decrypt encrypted passwords stored locally on the system to use it to access other components using the privileges of the compromised user.

item.title: CVE-2019-3746|2024-08-04T19:19:18.491Z -- dell -- integrated%20data%20protection%20appliance
item.description: Dell EMC Integrated Data Protection Appliance versions prior to 2.3 do not limit the number of authentication attempts to the ACM API. An authenticated remote user may exploit this vulnerability to launch a brute-force authentication attack in order to gain access to the system.
